channel.title: Stuff.co.nz - Stuff
channel.description: Top Stories from Stuff.co.nz. New Zealand, world, sport, business & entertainment news on Stuff.co.nz.

item.title: What exactly does the Clean Car Discount mean for car buyers?
item.description: What cars are eligible? How much discount will you get? How much more will you pay for a diesel ute? We take a look at the biggest questions surrounding the new Clean Car Discount.
item.dc:creator: DAMIEN O'CARROLL

item.title: Head to head: the three cheapest EVs in New Zealand
item.description: We put the three cheapest new EVs in New Zealand up against other to see which is the best budget baby EV on the market right now.
item.dc:creator: DAMIEN O'CARROLL

item.title: New Zealand lose Davis Cup tie against South Korea, winning just one rubber in tie
item.description: New Zealand's hopes of qualifying for next year's Davis Cup finals have come to an end with a 3-1 defeat in Newport, Rhode Island.
item.dc:creator: DAVID LONG

item.title: Making the switch to EV: the time is now
item.description: OPINION: Is now the right time to make the switch to an EV? Mark Gilbert, chair of Drive Electric, says yes.
item.dc:creator: MARK GILBERT

item.title: Every new EV on sale in New Zealand
item.description: More and more EVs are becoming available to New Zealand new car buyers. here's a guide to all of the ones currently available.
item.dc:creator: DAMIEN O'CARROLL

item.title: When will EVs cost the same as (or less than) ICE cars?
item.description: EVs currently cost more than equivalent ICE models, but that isn't actually far off from changing.
item.dc:creator: DAMIEN O'CARROLL

item.title: EV battery fires: why do they happen and why are they so bad?
item.description: EVs catch fire far less than ICE vehicles do, but you mightn't realise that from the headlines. But what makes EV fires so bad?
item.dc:creator: DAVE MCLEOD

item.title: Cash or charge: what happens to old EV batteries?
item.description: There is a common misconception that the country will be littered with dead EV batteries before long. But EV batteries don’t just become unusable because they are no longer suitable for powering a car.
item.dc:creator: DAVE MCLEOD

item.title: What do you need at home for EV ownership?
item.description: Thinking about buying an EV? Then to get the best out of it, it would pay to consider what you need at home as well.
item.dc:creator: NILE BIJOUX

item.title: Is now the time to go electric?
item.description: OPINION: If you are thinking of buying a new car, you have probably wondered if you should go electric. But is now the right time?
item.dc:creator: DAMIEN O'CARROLL

item.title: All Blacks player ratings: Ethan Blackadder and Tupou Vaa'i stand out
item.description: OPINION: A new-look All Blacks side got the job done against Argentina, and two younger players made their mark.
item.dc:creator: PAUL CULLY

item.title: All Blacks: World Rugby top ranking meaningless to Ardie Savea until Boks beaten
item.description: Skipper Ardie Savea says the All Blacks must beat the world champion Springboks to be considered top dog.
item.dc:creator: RICHARD KNOWLER

item.title: Cloudy Kitchen's small batch chocolate chip cookies
item.description: This is a no-mixer recipe – it all comes together in a bowl, making it quick and easy.
item.dc:creator: ERIN CLARKSON

item.title: Comedian Chris Parker on how he got over his lockdown funk
item.description: OPINION: Lockdown season five has been tough on morale, but the Celebrity Treausre Island and Instagram star has some tips to get through it.
item.dc:creator: CHRIS PARKER

item.title: Helen Kelly: Together: The humbling record of a life superbly lived hits DocPlay
item.description: REVIEW: What will stay with you isn't the details, the victories, or the battles still yet to win. It will be the sheer quality of Kelly's spirit.
item.dc:creator: GRAEME TUCKETT

item.title: Jess Quinn: 'our differences are our superpower'
item.description: Life may have dealt Jess Quinn a difficult hand, but she says it’s the getting back up that counts.
item.dc:creator: SARA BUNNY

item.title: American Rust: The shadow of Mare looms over Jeff Daniel's drab new Neon drama
item.description: REVIEW: Where Kate Winslet's similarly themed show crackled with tension and provided unexpected turns, this is blighted by sometimes plodding pacing.
item.dc:creator: JAMES CROOT

item.title: Spider-Man 2: One of the greatest superhero movies of all-time comes to Three
item.description: REVIEW: A sequel to rival The Empire Strikes Back and Batman Returns, there's never been a better time to discover or rewatch Sam Raimi's stunner.
item.dc:creator: JAMES CROOT

item.title: From flatmates to a family home
item.description: Sara and Lee Corleison had hardly any furniture when they moved into their own place while expecting their daughter.
item.dc:creator: PATTIE PEGLER

item.title: Tired eyes: Five eye creams to help you look wide awake
item.description: Looking fatigued can be attributed to a number of things – dull skin, pale skin tone, an irritable expression – but it’s the eyes that usually give it away,
item.dc:creator: ZOE WALKER AHWA
